knimeNode.name: Voting Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the most frequent value from a collection of prediction columns.

fullDescription.intro: Computes the most frequent value from a collection of winner columns. Each column is provided at the time and appended to the input table.
fullDescription.option: Column that are used to determine the most frequent value.

ports.inPort: Table winner column is selected from
ports.outPort: Table with all winner column plus the most frequent value
